topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543d9d0d63687237b2110300#post_543d9d0d63687237b2110300
Real talk I sometimes do those Karate Chop messages to my Mom and Sis they surprisingly say it feels good.

ALSO, I know how that pain feels and it indeed does suck.

I hope ye gets better man! Try taking some pain pills when you get home if you have any.
